name: part_002
file: tmp_舞台 「尾丸ポルカ」～あゝ素晴らしきアイドル人生かな～【#尾丸ポルカ2周年】 [jEaTxwIKamw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka wanders the dark streets, monologuing about her uncertain future as an idol.
Omaru Polka performs the song 'Laser Girl' (Loser Girl) on the city streets.
Title card for the song performance.
Title card: 'Meeting with the top idols of this world'.
Polka enters a grand hall and discovers Sakura Miko and Himemori Luna holding a solemn 'idol live'.

subtitles.original: これからどうなっちゃうの？
subtitles.english: What's going to happen to me now?

subtitles.original: アイドルライブ…できるのかな？
subtitles.english: Will I be able to... do an idol live?

subtitles.original: でもアイドルはそんなことしないとか、違法とか言ってたし…
subtitles.english: But they said idols don't do those things, and that it's illegal...

subtitles.original: えー！？やだ！
subtitles.english: Eh!? No way!

subtitles.original: 私まだいっぱい歌いたい歌あるし、
subtitles.english: I still have so many songs I want to sing,

subtitles.original: アイドルライブやりたいし！
subtitles.english: and I want to do idol lives!

subtitles.original: それに…
subtitles.english: Besides...

subtitles.original: ファンの子たちにだっていっぱい想い届けたいから。
subtitles.english: Because I want to deliver so many feelings to the fans too.

subtitles.original: そんなのおかしいじゃん。
subtitles.english: That's just wrong.

subtitles.original:
レーザーガール
作詞/作曲:sasanomaly
subtitles.english:
Laser Girl
Lyrics/Composition: sasanomaly

subtitles.original: あのね私ルーザーガール
subtitles.english: You know, I'm a loser girl

subtitles.original: だって開き直るしかないじゃん
subtitles.english: Because I have no choice but to be defiant

subtitles.original: レッテル貼られて悪くはない
subtitles.english: Being labeled isn't so bad

subtitles.original: 仕方がないけど今までは
subtitles.english: It can't be helped, but until now...

subtitles.original: 負けられないのよ
subtitles.english: I can't afford to lose

subtitles.original: ここで勝たなきゃもう人生一生止まって
subtitles.english: If I don't win here, my life will stop forever

subtitles.original: じゃあ私にできることは何
subtitles.english: So, what is it that I can do?

subtitles.original: さあ私にできることは何
subtitles.english: Come on, what is it that I can do?

subtitles.original: 誰か教えて それじゃダメなのと
subtitles.english: Someone tell me, will I struggle forever

subtitles.original: 一生もがんだか
subtitles.english: knowing it's no good?

subtitles.original: あの子みたいになりたくて
subtitles.english: I wanted to be like that girl

subtitles.original: あの子みたいになれなくて
subtitles.english: But I couldn't be like her

subtitles.original: 楽しくて 満たされて
subtitles.english: Until it ends with being fun, being fulfilled,

subtitles.original: もういいやって終わるまで
subtitles.english: and saying "I'm done"

subtitles.original: 最初ってそんなもんで
subtitles.english: That's how it is at first

subtitles.original: 自分に言い聞かせて
subtitles.english: I keep telling myself

subtitles.original: でもいっそ 足りなくて
subtitles.english: But rather, it's not enough,

subtitles.original: もういいやって止まれない
subtitles.english: and I can't stop even if I say "I'm done"

subtitles.original: 気づいた時私は
subtitles.english: By the time I realized,

subtitles.original: 何者かになりたくて
subtitles.english: I wanted to become someone

subtitles.original: だんだん周りが見えてきたんだ
subtitles.english: Gradually I started to see my surroundings,

subtitles.original: ライバルが立ち並んで
subtitles.english: with rivals standing all around

subtitles.original: だんだん私の立場も見えて
subtitles.english: Gradually I saw my own position,

subtitles.original: 大したことないな
subtitles.english: and realized it's nothing much

subtitles.original: レッテル貼られて悪くはない
subtitles.english: Being labeled isn't so bad

subtitles.original: スパイスなんだけど今までは
subtitles.english: It was a spice, but until now...

subtitles.original: 言いたいだけなのよ
subtitles.english: I just want to say it

subtitles.original: ここで勝たなきゃもう人生一生止まって
subtitles.english: If I don't win here, my life will stop forever

subtitles.original: じゃあ私にできることは何
subtitles.english: So, what is it that I can do?

subtitles.original: さあ私にできることは何
subtitles.english: Come on, what is it that I can do?

subtitles.original: 努力したけど それじゃダメなのと
subtitles.english: I made an effort, but will I struggle forever

subtitles.original: 一生もがんだか
subtitles.english: knowing it's no good?

subtitles.original: あの子みたいになりたくて
subtitles.english: I wanted to be like that girl

subtitles.original: あの子みたいになれなくて
subtitles.english: But I couldn't be like her

subtitles.original: どんどん周りと距離が離れて
subtitles.english: More and more the distance from others grows,

subtitles.original: ライバルですらなくて
subtitles.english: I'm not even a rival

subtitles.original: どんどん私の足元崩れて
subtitles.english: More and more the ground beneath my feet crumbles,

subtitles.original: このまま落ちようか
subtitles.english: shall I just fall?

subtitles.original: あのね私ルーザーガール
subtitles.english: You know, I'm a loser girl

subtitles.original: 待って置いていかないでよなんて
subtitles.english: Wait, don't leave me behind, or something like that

subtitles.original: あのね私ルーザーガール
subtitles.english: You know, I'm a loser girl

subtitles.original: だって開き直るしかないじゃん
subtitles.english: Because I have no choice but to be defiant

subtitles.original: レッテル貼られて悪くはない
subtitles.english: Being labeled isn't so bad

subtitles.original: 仕方がないけど今までは
subtitles.english: It can't be helped, but until now...

subtitles.original: 生き抜くためなのよ
subtitles.english: It's for the sake of surviving

subtitles.original: ここで見せなきゃもう人生一生止まって
subtitles.english: If I don't show it here, my life will stop forever

subtitles.original: じゃあ私にできることは何
subtitles.english: So, what is it that I can do?

subtitles.original: さあ私にできることは何
subtitles.english: Come on, what is it that I can do?

subtitles.original: 誰か教えて それじゃダメなのと
subtitles.english: Someone tell me, will I struggle forever

subtitles.original: 一生もがんだか
subtitles.english: knowing it's no good?

subtitles.original: 努力したけど それじゃダメなのと
subtitles.english: I made an effort, but will I struggle forever

subtitles.original: 一生もがんだか
subtitles.english: knowing it's no good?

subtitles.original: あの子みたいになりたくて
subtitles.english: I wanted to be like that girl

subtitles.original: あの子みたいになれなくて
subtitles.english: But I couldn't be like her

subtitles.original: この世界のトップアイドルとの出会い
subtitles.english: Meeting with the top idols of this world

subtitles.original: ひよこの声がしたのは、こっちの方かな？
subtitles.english: Did Hiyoko's voice come from this way?

subtitles.original: なんかすごい盛り上がってたけど、
subtitles.english: It seemed really lively,

subtitles.original: もしかして、アイドルライブ？
subtitles.english: could it be an idol live?

subtitles.original: あ！
subtitles.english: Ah!

subtitles.original: あれ？
subtitles.english: Wait?

subtitles.original: やっぱり！アイドルライブじゃん！
subtitles.english: I knew it! It is an idol live!

subtitles.original: ねぇ、なんでそんな笑ってないの？
subtitles.english: Hey, why aren't you guys smiling?

subtitles.original: え？やっぱりさ、おかしいよね？違法なアイドルライブなんて。
subtitles.english: Eh? It really is strange, right? An illegal idol live.

subtitles.original: 今のアイドルってどうなっちゃったの？
subtitles.english: What's happened to idols nowadays?

subtitles.original: ねぇ、もっとキラキラしてるアイドルに、
subtitles.english: Hey, I want to become a more sparkling idol,

subtitles.original: ポルカ、もう一回なりたいよ！
subtitles.english: Polka wants to become one again!

subtitles.original: どうすればいいの？
subtitles.english: What should I do?

subtitles.original: ダメなのだよ。
subtitles.english: It's no good.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: アイドルは笑顔なんて見せないのら。
subtitles.english: Idols don't show smiles.

subtitles.original: そんな…
subtitles.english: No way...

subtitles.original: アイドルはみんなの手の届かない、
subtitles.english: Idols are beings out of everyone's reach,

subtitles.original: 神聖で素晴らしいもの。
subtitles.english: sacred and wonderful.

subtitles.original: あなたもこうなりたいなら、頑張るしかないね。
subtitles.english: If you want to be like this too, you'll just have to do your best.

subtitles.original: え？いやいや、やっぱりそんなのおかしいって。
subtitles.english: Eh? No, no, that's definitely wrong.

subtitles.original: それに、ファンの皆はそもそも…
subtitles.english: And besides, the fans in the first place...
